author: zhangkai.
content: Hi, [EIP-2718](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2718) add a TransactionType before the TransactionPayload. I had test the ethclient and ethers.js It seems when I pass Type 0 to Transaction the 0 will not included. so there is no the format 0x00||LegacyTxPlayload. am I correct?

author: samwilsn
content:
>  legacy transaction types, which always start with a byte >= `0xc0`.

From: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2718#transactiontype-only-goes-up-to-0x7f
